mapper.select:
SELECT contact.id, contact.user_id, contact.first_name, contact.last_name, contact.email, contact.phone, contact.mobile, contact.company, contact_groups.group_name FROM contact JOIN contact_groups ON contact.group_id = contact_groups.id WHERE contact.email = #{email} AND contact.is_deleted = 0
and contact.group_id = #{groupId}
